Name: Lauren Stossel, New York City Board of Corrections
Title: Resolution approving the appointment by the Council of Lauren Stossel as a member of the New York City Board of Corrections.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text: RESOLVED, Pursuant to Section 626 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment of Lauren Stossel, a resident of Brooklyn, as a member of the New York City Board of Corrections to serve the remainder of a six-year term that expires on February 1, 2029.

By Council Member Powers\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj RESOLVED, Pursuant to Section 626 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment of Lauren Stossel, a resident of Brooklyn, as a member of the New York City Board of Corrections to serve the remainder of a six-year term that expires on February 1, 2029.\par
